alert.note: Alert for Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:53PM EDT until September 09 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL DICKENSON COUNTY... At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Haysi, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clintwood, Haysi, John Flannagan Lake, Clinchco, and McClure. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
